content.detailedDescription:
I was inside the lodge eating dinner. my friend eric got me because he had seen something. in the western sky over the ocean there seemed to be a distant, dull light moving near the horizon that clearly was not a planet or star. then, large bright flashes of light, four in a vertical row, appeared in sequence towards zenith.  the flashes appeared to have blue/green, red then a gold color. their light was bright enough (perhaps close enough) to the water to reflect light on the surface like the moon or a search light.

i felt a calm, familiar presence from them. 

a second series, this time as many as seven, but more than four, going horizontally from w to s appeared soon after. this was the last observation about 7pm in the evening.
content.summary: Multiple sequences of light flashes between four and seven in a line.

content.detailedDescription: There was a weird light next to the sun in the clouds the had a round shape as it shown on the picture i took.
content.summary: Another light appear next to the sun , check pictures

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at first to go grab something from my car. i saw a star like light, that was pulsing, almost making different shapes, going one direction, then going the opposite direction in a diagonal path. this continued as it got closer and closer. it looked as it was dropping things, picking up things. we watched as beams of lights (red,yellow) came from what would be from the front and backs of the ufo. the main star like light gave the ship a dull outline of the size. when it would reach one point in the sky, it was easily seen that is was turning to make its rounds. soon we would even see it shot rounds of three red orbs onto the ground. and then for a few short seconds, the ufo was visible, clarifying what it was. it had a larger rectangular body. violet in color, with two arms at the front of the ship that had turned, making the entire ship turn with them. we watched for about 5 hours before the ship took off. when it took off into the night sky, you could see a tail of fuel of something it left when it would change course slightly. it looked to have hidden behind a sphere like object, that was only noticed by its light disappearing behind it, right before sunrise. i was in shook, i pinched myself to make sure i was not dreaming and asked my friends more then once if he was seeing all of this. there is much more detail, that is imprinted into my head but would take hours to describe. please if anyone else saw this, report it. anyone in the missouri area. i did leave one thing out, all pictures that where taken where wiped from my sd card right after, and the camera i used was drained of its battery's 3 times trying to capture a picture.. this is what freaked me out almost more then anything. please if anyone has an explanation, i'm not trying to make a story, i just want it explained.
content.summary: We watched a star like light at first go back and forth, watching the ground. dropping, picking up.

content.detailedDescription: On october 31, 2014 at approximately 8:25 pm i was in my back yard letting my dog out and smoking a cigarette. i had my whole house lit up inside and had all my sliding doors and windows open. i was casually looking around outside when something caught my eye above the treeline and power lines that run all the way down my neighborhood. when i first witnessed it, it appeared to just be coming out of a gradual and smooth right turn. it seemed to almost hover for a second and continue south when i yelled for my wife to come outside. she ran out in a matter of 5 seconds and i said "what is that, do you see what i see?" she looked up and at that time it was straightened out and heading south, appearing to be above the treeline by a couple hundred feet. the object looked like a boomerang or triangle shape and almost faded into the night sky and was lit up by the moon (once it got closer to the moon, we could see it a little clearer). it glided effortlessly with no apparent sound and no lights that we saw. it was a clear night, not a cloud in the sky. it was well lit by the half moon. this object appeared to be gray/black but seemed to change like a mirage and we had to focus to see it until it went too far into the distance we could no longer see it. when i first saw it, i quickly tried to rationalize this to being a large flock of geese or large turkey vulture or some sort of large bird. i even thought it may have been a hang-glider. this all went through my brain within 2 seconds and once i dismissed all of these possibilities is when i yelled for my wife to come out which is when she saw it too. neither of us have any explanation for what we saw in that short 20 seconds or so. we both felt confused, baffled and excited! i have also felt a little bit of anxiety. we tried to contact mufon of florida by email the very next day but have never heard back. almost 2 weeks later and we can't get it out of our minds and keep thinking back on it. we are very curious if there were other sightings in our area.
content.summary: Large, dark triangle/boomerang shaped object, no lights, no sound, floating effortlessly over the tree lines and power lines.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south #475 approaching ohio turnpike overpass. i saw what i first thought was a plane about size of a lear jet flying way too low across the highway. it was impossible to not see it.It had 3 white lites one at each end and one in middle about 5 to 8 ft above the others.  it did not have any strobe lights and did not make any sound that i could here.    after covering the 200 to 300ft to the point where it crossed the highway i turned my head to the left (east) to get a rear view of it..It was about a half mile away by then .I was extremly surprised by what i saw. i saw what appeared to be a rectangular panel of solid bright red lights made up of 6 to 8 smaller panels butted together.  i was now quite certain i saw something that was no aircraft as we know them.I had to start watching where i was going and lost track of it.                   i am able to make good drawings of what i saw but i do not know how to send them to you by computer . i have to use us postal service. please send me your mailing address  or tel. number. you can e mail me.
content.summary: Moved at 200 to 300 mph at 100 to150ft alt.Going west to east about 200 to 300 ft in front of me

content.detailedDescription: I purchased some new polarized sunglasses for a road trip and was on my way home when i noticed the distinction of the clouds and how there were crazy designs in the sky making for strange patterns... so much so that i pulled over to look at. the whole sight before me looking east from hwy 12 strongly resembled both the japanese flags and contrails from old world war 2 bombers in formation. i then continued on my way when i noticed a black object under cloud cover hovering over a hill area, then sharply and quickly took off in a northern direction towards northern santa rosa until i lost sight of it. i felt perplexed over what i saw and looked to see if anyone else saw but they were busy driving going about their days. it departed with the speed of a fighter jet but no sound. at one point it did seem to morph and was difficult to focus on and drive. it seemed to transform and while doing that,have a constant rotating while continuing north.
content.summary: The first thought that came to mind was a viper from battle star galactica

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside by the pool just after 11pm having a smoke and was looking up at the stars as i always do at night. quite suddenly a bright aqua blue disk shaped craft came flying over my rooftop heading south at about 800-1000 feet agl and flew into a small stationary cloud. the ufo was about the size of a small passenger jet. i could no longer see the craft or any light from it after it went inside the cloud, however the cloud began to move rapidly to the ne over my head towards mt lemon right after the ufo enterd into it! there was no wind whatsoever and no other clouds in the sky except for this one small cloud that had been completely stationary before the ufo flew into it. i can only speculate that the cloud was already hiding/cloaking a larger craft and the blue ufo that i saw must have joined up with it or inside of it. this is not the first time i have witnessed a craft hiding inside of a cloud before. i reported a similar event a few years ago up in the sedona arizona region during the daytime when i watched a very small cloud in anè otherwise cloudless sky moving overhead yet stopping and starting and changing direction despite the fact that there was once again no wind present at the time. i have seen dozens of ufo's here in the arizona skies over the past 10 years and it is always a thrill to witness them. i have attempted to contact them mentally on several occasions when i have spotted them and several times they actually flashed a very bright beam of light right at me to let me know that they somehow heard me and were acknowledging my request for verification of their existence. very exciting to know that they are here !
content.summary: Aqua blue disk flew fast into small cloud then made cloud move fast in ne direction

content.detailedDescription: Bright white light in sky, no blinking lights, not as high up as the stars. it was larger than a plane, and moving much faster. it moved across the sky and slightly upwards very quickly reminding me of a meteorite except it was too close to be one. then it sped up as it got higher then disappeared. it was like watching a sci-fi movie when the ship goes into warp drive and disappears.
content.summary: It moved very rapidly upwards, then sped up even faster and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Spotted multiple objects again after my last report on october 29th 2014. this time again on saturday evening around 9pm november 8th in my bedroom, windows wide open, perfectly clear night looked out and observed bright glowing red and white lights hovering up above the south west novato/west marin mountains. object hovered then ascended finally taking a straight path from the south west toward the south east. stopping and hovering over mt burdel open space area. objects appeared from the west and traveled over toward the first object hovering for a few min then blinking out or descending below or behind the mountain. lights appeared on the actual mt burdel open space area, first starting off as a bright white light intensifying into 2 separate lights then back into 1 then turning bright red. the lights seemed to dance upon the hill moving erratically changing direction abruptly and very strangely. this time i can hear other witnesses in the valley reacting to the lights in the sky. i specifically overheard someone saying wow look at that, wow there is another one. shortly after that a jet did appear from the north west headed south looked like a big wing, large triangle or stealth plane? it was very different from commercial aircraft. there were horse ranchers on the hill at the exact same time i witnessed the lights as they must have noticed them as well. i have spoken with marin sherrifs deputy and marin open space park ranger who were both dispatched out on the mt burdel open spaced trail head the next morning. they did not mention receiving any reports however mentioned to me that there were ranchers out on the hill looking for a lost horse. im attempting to contact the ranchers to question if they noticed the strange objects/lights. something very strange going on over here in north novato area. no idea what these thing are?
content.summary: Second ufo sighting in 2 weeks.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my garden;when suddenly i saw someting unusual.It s was something who didn t look like something of our world....
content.summary: Object not identify fly like lightball in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was more or less 11:30pm when i was driving my car back home after my night shift. the event took place in the valley "fondo valle alento" between chieti and francavilla al mare (abruzzo) italy. in those days on that street there were no street lights. what made me notice the object (big as a golf ball, bright, lime green sphere) was because it was dark and a clear night and no other cars were around. as soon i saw the object on my left more or less (100 meters) away from me, i couldn’t believe what i was seeing. so i opened my window and put my head out to actually look at it carefully! my speed was 80kmph. the sphere was slightly going faster than me. i would say 100kmph. it was going straight. it went over the cement factory, over the house after the factory and then just vanished through some trees. without seeding up or anything! i couldn’t believe what i saw. i remember it so clearly and still can’t explain it. i was on a high and couldn’t wait to tell someone what i saw. off corse people diden't believe me.
content.summary: Bright lime glowing green sphere

content.detailedDescription: My name is [name removed/cms/tg] and i was taken by the greys . not only was i taken by the grey's but they took me back in time on their craft many hundreds of thousands of years ago with these two feet.  im on many petroglyphs.  and that one petroglyph im holding my arms up and a grey's face over me because of what has happened to me. this isn't your average ufo abduction case this is a biblical scale ufo event with gods . i was given implants and a map of the stars on my right side of the night sky the seven sisters. i was given implants . im not a person who saw a ufo . im a person who drove a ufo because of the fact that i was apart of the collective because of my implants. im the only one in our history that has ever took a real picture of the power of the grey's in the sky . and im the only one in our history that has ever took a real picture of the great spirit god.  and im the only one in our history that has ever took a picture of himself in heaven because i died many hundreds of thousands of years ago back in time.  ibwas a gift from the stars i was dropped off right in front of the anasazi indains they took me as there child. i was made in many way by my elders. what has happened to me placed me in the greatest middle of all things because i was taken back in time.  many have happend to me because of this.  my name is [name removed/cms/tg] . and im still this gift in our time . im from an old ancient indain legend and im also from a prophecy. please call me asap thank you
content.summary: I was taken by the grey's and they took me back in time and i have the proof .

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing this report as a follow-up corroborating that of my former fiancee who was with me at the time and reported this event. 

my report is very similar in content to that of my former fiancee but i will add a few things that were left out for some reason(i doubt it was intentional).

i believe it was around late october of 1985 when this event took place.  i lived in a neighborhood in columbus ohio about half a mile east of i-71 and not far from downtown.  my fiancee and i left my home on my motorcycle because it had just started snowing heavily and we wanted to get where we were going before the roads got too bad.

after turning onto the main road towards i-71 i noticed small crowd of teenagers and young adults standing in the middle of the street ahead of us.  i had to stop the bike in order to avoid hitting them.  all of them were staring up in the air toward the south of the road above the large parking lot which had once been an old rinks department store and had been turned into a tractor trailer parking lot.

my fiancee and i looked up to the left and saw three painfully bright white lights arrange in a triangular formation fairly close together.  as my eyes adjusted i made out the shape of a very large parallogram-shaped object suspended above the parking lot.  the two of us debated what it was for a moment and we both realized the object had no visible means of support and was not making any sound at all.  i could see that the falling snow was leaving an outline of the object below it on the surface of the parking lot.

at this point my fiance began to get pretty hysterical and demanded that we leave.  but i said that i wanted to get a closer look.  so i parked the bike and walked across the parking lot until i reached a distance of perhaps fifty or sixty feet horizontally away from the object.

as i got closer i realized that it was not quite as large or as high up as i had initially thought.  there were a few semi tractor trailers parked in the lot and using them as a size reference i would estimate the length of the object to be roughly 120 to 150 feet and it was hovering absolutely motionless about 50 feet off the ground.  it was a dull silvery-grey color overall and was covered in what appeared to be panels or plates some of which protruded perhaps a few feet here and there in geometric shapes, mostly squares and rectangles.  when i walked toward the opposite end of the object i saw five light blue rectangles which covered most of that end.  they appeared to be illuminated from the inside and i saw what appeared to be several fuzzy, indistinct outlines of human or humanoid shaped figures.

from the time i reached perhaps 100 feet or so from the object i felt a very odd sensation which i honestly can only describe as having my sense of the passage of time distorted such that i could not tell if i stood there for five minutes or for an hour.  the sensation grew stronger the closer i got. it was a very unnerving and overwhelming sensation. 

after some time, i'm not sure how long, i saw an intense blue column of light emitted from the bottom center of the object to the ground.  i think this lasted for a few seconds but am honestly uncertain.  again, there was still no sound at all and i remember being aware of actually hearing snowflakes hitting the ground.

the next thing i recall was the object moving vertically and still soundlessly at an extremely high velocity so that it was out of sight almost instantly.

i then walked back to the motorcycle and my fiancee and noticed that the other people who had been on the street were all gone.  my fiancee was very  angry at me and still hysterical as we finished our motorcycle ride.

the two of us were never married and have not seen each other or had any contact since 1986 or so.

i would just like to follow up by saying that at the time this occurred i was a sergeant in the usafr serving as an aeromedical evacuation tech.  i didn't report anything at the time since i didn't want it to affect my service record.  later i didn't report it because my brother was a usaf cryptographer at the foreign technologies division at wright patterson afb and i did not want to cause him more stress than he already had.  sadly my brother died ten years ago and i finally decided i really should report what we saw.

additionally i am a licensed pilot and aircraft builder.  i first soloed in 1979.  i spent most of the last thirty years as a software developer.
content.summary: Up-close encounter with parallelogram-shaped ufo over ohio parking lot

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed trying to finish a project for school that was due the next day. i look up and see blood red and dark blue lights through the holes in my blinds. i immediately dismiss it thinking it was another airplane passing through. but thirty minutes later, its still there. me, being my curious self, turn off my lights and look outside. when i see it, my heart catches in my throat. it was really large i could see it clearly. it was a giant silver dome with flashing pink and site lights underneath and on top where the cockpit should be. but where the lights were underneath thew ship, there were long transculent tentacles that would change color. i observed for a few more minutes and saw it looked like it as pulsating with electricity. waves of pink, blue, green, yellow, and white would ripple throughout the whole body. it would shine and sparkle every time it pulsed with electricity. i stared in awe for what seemed like forever, then realized that it could be an alien ship, and tip toe into my parents room. i show my mother the ufos, she tells me to get down and get off of facebook (i was already posting what i drew because i have a crappy phone camera and couldn't take a photo in the dark.) i'm kinda freaking out with excitement, so i joke about the nazis coming to get us, and she tells me to go back to sleep its not aliens. every time i would bring it up, she would berate me. so i lay down awake in cold sweat, too filled with excitement and adrenaline to sleep. two hours later, they're still there hovering in their jellyfish craft, but this time its glowing a bright blue, then i hear a deafening hum and it disappears. in star wars, when they go into hyperspace, the ship looks like its being stretched out, then they disappear. that's exactly what this ship did, except left a blue streak behind for the briefest of seconds, then dissipated.
content.summary: Woke up to see distant red and blue lights. look outside and its at least 300ft away. it was just hovering there. there were at least five other ships spread out around it.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the backseat of my family car, heading northbound on the frontage of us highway 281. we had just passed the light on tx 107 when out of the corner of my eye i saw something in the sky southeast of my position. at first i thought it was a plane but the shape and the movements where wrong. it was a cigar shaped object that appeared to be stationary. the object was very shiny and that's what really caught my attention. it was a clear day no cloud cover what so ever. i observed the object in the time it took us to get from 107 to kuhn st. the object didn't appear to change position. there is a motel on the corner of the frontage and kuhn street. when we turned onto kuhn st i lost line of sight with the object because of the motel. my house is two blocks down from the motel. in the time it took us t get home the object had vanished. i got off of the car and started looking forward forward h the object, it was no where in sight.
content.summary: I saw a reflective object in the sky while in a car. i went behind a building and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: These photos were sent to me by a friend. she posted them on her facebook page to see if anyone knew what they might be. she said everyone was getting out of their cars,to look,and photograph the lights.
content.summary: A women sent me the photos,she knew  i studied this. bright lights in the sky looks to be 5 spheres,in the shape of a triangle,many people saw it and took photos

content.detailedDescription: I'm not reporting seeing a ufo. i'm reporting a possible sighting of an alien. this photo appeared on my android phone. the time the photo was taken, i want asleep. to me the image on the photo look like that of an alien. i could be wrong, but i seriously doubt it. there's more i'd like to share with you, but i'll do that if i get a call. i was at home asleep on the couch.
content.summary: It was an entity, not ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Tuesday 11/11/14 10:55p wilmington nc: i witnessed a ufo on my way to work, go behind the woods on mlk jr highway by the airport. i almost dismissed it as a plane but noticed that this object was circular shaped with multi-colored led flashing lights all around it. right now you can go to mlk jr and see that these lights are still flashing behind the woods. i don’t know if there’s new plane tech being tested or what. this is not a military airspace territory so that theory doesn’t seem to plausible. i do not have any proof to my sighting as i was driving to work already late. from the angle it came i could tell it was large but couldn't judge the size of the craft. i felt calm at first then a little uneasy when i got to work. i told my co-worker about it and she and her friend said they were going to investigate it. i lost sight of the object behind the woods but could still see visible continuous pulsating of lights.
content.summary: Ufo martin luthur king jr highway

content.detailedDescription:
on 110814 i was vacationing with family (wife and child) in la quinta ca.  after spending the day hours in downtown palm springs we returned to our rental in la quinta ca. we changed and headed for the pool. we rode our bikes from our home to a pool located near the main gate of the community. we swam in the pool and then moved to the hot tub. 
   while in the hot tub we relaxed and stargazed, as we often do while we are there. i began looking west towards the santa rosa mountains admiring the numerous stars in the night sky. we talked about how dark it was compared with home in oregon for the time of day, it was around 1815 to 1840 hours. we chatted about how many stars were visible and how pleasant it was out. 
   a movement in the sky next to a 2 palm trees which line the interior sw corner of the pool landscaping caught my eye. i thought at first it must be the shadow of a large bird flapping its wings. it took a second for me to realize it was not bird in flight. the object was not just behind the palm tree but in the sky beyond it. it occupied the airspace between my location and the mountain. as it moved across the sky from behind the palm tree i saw it was large. its size made it difficult to judge its actual dimensions (i would guess as large as a commercial airliner) or its altitude in the sky. frankly, its appearance confused me so could only base my observations by comparing it to the mountain and palm trees. from my vantage point it was as large as the top of the palm tree fronds (not its actual size but the object was in the distance and still looked about the size palm tree top) this palm tree is about 40 feet tall and the object was about the same size in the sky. its altitude seemed to be no more than the height of the mountain that runs adjacent to the community on the far west side.
   when i first noticed the object it seemed blurry. it moved into a clearing passed the palm trees at an angle just in front of me. there were no obstructions between myself and the object. it was literally right in front of me. the night sky was my backdrop as it moved across the sky. it was a large equilateral triangle. its height was far less in comparison to its length of its sides. the outside of it was darker than the night sky but it blended into the sky above it. the object itself was black and seemed shiny when it was at its most focused point (meaning the shape was blurry and then came into focus). i could make out the outer edges of the triangle and also the whole body as it blocked the stars in the sky it passed in front of. i could not make out any surface details.
   each corner of the triangle housed a round light. the lights were not small beacon lights but quite large. the round lights were not extremely bright and seemed a muted yellow even dim. the lights did not pulsate or flash like airplane beacons either.  it also appeared clearer to me the more directly in front of me it was. it continued across the sky until it was ne of me. it passed behind more palm trees at which point i lost it in the sky and could no longer locate it. the object made no noise and seemed completely silent.
   the aircraft moved from the sw towards the ne across the sky. it moved slowly but never stopped, slower than a c130 at an airshow slow. the entire aircraft slowly rotated on its axis. i believe it rotated counter clockwise. it did not change direction or altitude. its movement across the sky seemed effortless. it seemed to float in the air like a raft would float on the water but light like cottonwood seed fuzz. a smooth movement like a ball bearing rolling across a glass top table. its movement was very different than any plane, helicopter or balloon i have ever seen. smooth, slow, light and effortless.
   during the time i was watching the object i attempted to point it out to my wife and young son. neither were able to see it and they told me i was quite excited while pointing toward it and not making much sense to them. i described to them what i saw a large triangle with three round lights in the corners slowly rotating as it moved across the sky. 
   important things about this siting. this was a calm night with little to no breeze. this particular community proximity to mountain makes flying a plane, helicopter too dangerous/not possible especially at night without lights. the community has only ground lighting. the community is far away from city lights. the community is flanked by the santa rosa mountains to the west blocking all light pollution from the west. the community is also far away from urban areas and is quite quiet, especially in the evenings. the object was much lower than any plane i have witnessed above the property. most planes i have seen are flying at cruising altitudes far above the mountains. the helicopters i have seen are military and also fly well above the mountains. i believe we had a full moon on the 8th but the moon starts low at the horizon line until it moves upwards into the sky later in the evening.
content.summary: I saw a large triangle with three round lights in the corners slowly rotating as it moved across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was on the porch facing ne and saw 2 objects with non flashing bright red lights traveling se close together. one then headed e and the other continued se. a minute later after 3 other witnesses came out a second pair headed in the same direction as the first another witness joined us to see what that was. we had binoculars and could see the outline of one of the craft. clouds then rolled in and we saw nothing else. the event lasted from 8:21 pm eastern time to 8:25 pm eastern time. we had a total of 5 witnesses.
content.summary: 2 sets of 2 ,, 2 red then 2 orange craft

content.detailedDescription: I was at the blue angel air show and was taking pictures of the planes when i noticed something shiny much higher than the planes.  i took picture towards the direction i saw it - i was unaware that i even had a picture but when i uploaded the pictures to my computer there were 2 that are very strange.  i'm not saying it is a ufo but i have no idea what it could be
content.summary: Saw object during blue angel air show

content.detailedDescription: My mother & i and my nephew were in a vehicle driving to a hockey practice. my mom noticed lights and wondered why the street lights were a different color. then i noticed that there were four or five bright red-orange orbs forming a triangle. once we got to the top of our hill i got out to take a picture or video with my nikon camera but nothing worked. then two of them turned their lights off after my flash on the camera tried to go off. we lost sight of the other object by the time we had parked by the road. we felt like we were witnessing something incredible & rare. might have been a bit frightened.  my nephew even said what if they were just hot air balloons? & i said i wonder if they r drones: i heard they were flying around now more than we know.
content.summary: They formed a triangle formation & flew off in same direction slowly

content.detailedDescription: I had been nervous inside for two days.On the second evening. my sister and i went and got burgers at hardees i was too keyed up to eat so i went outback to smoke. i took a couple draws and just happened to look up and there it was. it just hovered . it was shaped like a triangle but it's lights went up one side. there were five on one side and at the time it was fine on each side and one in the front.
content.summary: Had been nervous inside for two days.On the second evening. my sister and i went and got burgers at hardees i was too key d up to eat so i went outback to smoke. i took a couple draws and just happened to look up and there it was. it just hovered .

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in our living room watching tv and our two dogs playing in the room.  our 3rd dog was laying outside in the grass, within 2 feet of our sliding glass door/doggy door leading to outside backyard.  all of a sudden the dog outside made a horrendous noise/scream (not a bark) and shot into the house thru our doggy door like her tail was on fire. she nearly broke the sliding glass to get in!

 i jumped up as soon as i heard her and got to the sliding glass door/doggy door just in time to see it.  it was a fireball sphere that looked flame colored, had a definite orb outline, moved super fast, but wasn't solid.  i called to my husband and, from his recliner, he could see out the sliding glass door and witnessed the fireball disappear into the ground, leaving no hole, no burned area, no noticeable trace of impact.  it was like it vaporized into the ground.  we were quite shaken and our dog is now very cautious before going outside at night.  

immediately after, the lights in our neighborhood came on and a few neighbors said they saw it fall but didn't see where it landed.


my dog thought it was coming for her and i have never heard that sound from an animal in my life.

might not be an alien, but it wasn't a meteor.

all of our dogs have now dug a hole in the area as if to look for it.
content.summary: Fireball came from sky into my backyard and disappeared into the ground

content.detailedDescription:
I'll call myself in mufon, as "starborn". again, i will do my best to report what i am seeing here in imperial valley:  saturday evening, nov 8, 2014 at 6:45 pm on my sky watching location = outside on a 2nd story loft (no walls, open to outside).  i was looking south, towards mexicali, mex when i spotted some type of light from a distance. it is very difficult to estimate the distance. i have to guess, say 2 - 3 miles max?!? from where my home is located, i'd be looking towards the imperial valley mall located on dogwood road.  anyhow, i didn't think much of it, but i kept looking until i saw that its shape and "color" was odd and changing!! since it was moving extremely slow, i had enough time to grab my binoculars.  shock!  i clearly saw some kind of thing that had a movement that looked like blocks stuck together and especially, tumbling ever so slowly in sky, moving east-ward like towards yuma, arizona direction. 

again, lots of fear of what i was seeing. with my binoculars, i could clearly see that this thing was illuminated from within....Not a blimp!!!!  i was in shock and said something like, "oh my god, if you are not of this world, get the *!! out of our air space".  god is hearing me now, so i'm speaking and writing this in truth: when i said this out loud, this thing stopped in mid-air for i estimate a good 10 - 15 seconds in mid-air!!!! and then, it reversed its direction of travel..Back towards where i first saw it!!!   when it reversed direction, it moved exceedingly slow, tumbling, tumbling, end over end.  this not balloons or chinese lanterns!!! these don't stop in mid-air and reverse direction!  with binoculars still on, i could see that it looked like squares made of plasma, transparent-ish!?  once it reached the location where i first saw it, it dimmed and completely disappeared. last sighting have really concerned me; husband thinks ufos a joke; unfortunate he underestimates my intelligence, seriousness of what i am seeing.  i don't go outside expecting to see.  i go outside expecting to see nothing.  but i am.  signed: starborn. 
p.S.: to my mufon report # 61330, i forgot to document that i saw for 2nd time, the straight line of lights, 1/2 hr earlier on this date of sat., nov 8, 2014.
content.summary: Like tumbling squares, blocks ?!*   illuminated from within

content.detailedDescription: On thursday, august 18, 2011, at approximately 9 pm, the witness was in front of his house pulling his garden hose around from the side of his house to water his front yard. as he entered the street beyond his yard he happened to look east down his street in the distance, he noticed a disk-shaped object moving just beyond a line of trees across the far fields at the end of his street. this was around a couple of miles away from him. the object had bright yellow lights around its perimeter and blue lights below those. the bottom displayed red lights.
content.summary: Saw a disk-shaped ufo a mile away; then disappeared; then an orb-shaped, smaller object came from same direction and flew over me

content.detailedDescription:
After my last sighting on fri oct 24, 2014 (see mufon rpt # 61325)of something massive in sky, i am seeing more.  few days later on tues oct 28 at 8:05 pm, i was again standing outside on my 2nd story loft, looking up at the western sky. from the north, i saw a long, straight line of lights moving laterally at an extreme rate of speed. no noice whatsoever. this thing was not more than a mile and a half up in sky, and the night sky, as is 95% of the time here in the desert of imperial county was clear.

because the moon was on the eastern sky, the western sky was a bit darker, it was not visible what these lights were attached to, what shape or size this thing was.  (mufon, in its ufo report form as for "actual size", should be "estimated" 

i didn't even have time to put the binoculars up on my face.  once inside my house, i drew a straight line and place dots on it, to give myself an estimate of the number of lights that ran end to end of this thing. i estimate there were about 10 - 15 lights that ran end to end.
content.summary: Long, straight line of lights. extreme speed, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Last night(11/10/14) at 9pm, i went outside to bring our dog inside for the night. there are 4 steps going down from the back door of our house to the yard. i was standing on the top step, and called our dog to get his attention. i noticed something red out of the corner of my eye and looked  over to my right and noticed a bright pinkish red light in the sky (south east). there were no other lights on outside except the light at the top of the step and the streetlight out front by the road. the sky was clear and it was quiet.

i thought i was seeing things at first, so i walked to the bottom of the steps and looked up again. the light was still in the same spot. it didn't appear to be moving. it seemed to just be hovering there and glowing. i looked around the sky to see if there were any planes or anything, there was nothing else. 

i went back into the house to take the dog inside and to grab my phone to take a picture. when i came back out, the light was now directly east of me. i took the picture from the bottom of the steps and looked down to see if i was able to take a good picture of it. when i looked up in the sky again, the light was gone. i didn't hear anything and i walked around outside to try and find it again, but it disappeared
content.summary: Noticed bright pink and red light  in sky when on back step of home.

content.detailedDescription:
I took my two dogs outside our cabin in the hocking hills for the last time before bedtime. i always look up at the stars. the night in question was clear with lots of stars visible. i noticed the slight drone of aircraft engines and watched two airplanes approach each other from opposite directions. their path was above the treetops in the distance, and it appeared that they crossed paths, although i know there was distance between them. as i recall, their flight paths were fairly level at that particular time and place.

while i was watching the planes, i noticed what i thought was a particularly bright star well above the path of the airplanes. as the planes moved out of sight, i suddenly saw the bright light make a slow, steady descent in a completely straight line. it stopped just beneath the distant tree line, but i could see the light hover (very still) between the branches. i then watched the light ascend in a perfectly straight line and hover at about the same height as when i first saw it. the light descended a second time exactly the same as the first time, hovered, and then rose again in a straight line. this time, it seemed to hover just a little higher in the sky. 

when it descended the third time, it descended in a zigzag manner with a very slight trail of light following the zigzag motion. it hovered just below the treeline before i lost sight of it. 

the entire event happened over the course of about six or seven minutes. i had looked at the clock on my way out and the time was 9:01. it was a couple of minutes before i noticed the light. when i came in, the time was 9:11.  i had called my husband and he came out and saw it just before it reached the treeline level on its third descent.  

i was amazed and perplexed by the sighting. i had clearly heard the distant sound of the two planes that seemed to be moving in a flight line only slightly closer to me than the light. while i heard the planes, there was no sound at all from the light. i have been an outdoor camper since childhood, and i've never seen a light, a helicopter, or plane move in such a fashion. i also worked for years just outside rickenbacker air base and live very close to port columbus, so i am accustomed to seeing planes and helicopters. i have never seen anything in the sky that maneuvered like what i saw that night.
content.summary: Bright star-like light hovered high in sky, descended twice in an absolute straight line, then ascended in straight line. third descent was zig-zag before hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
This photograph is a 20 long exposer in the desert at night ..

i was trying to get a cool night time photograph of camel rock monument outside of santa fe n.M on saturday november 1st, seconds later a meteor appeared in the sky and was reported as far away as texas..
content.summary: Red lights before meteor
